faq.question: What is SharuX?
faq.answer: Sharux is a ShareX upload server.

faq.question: Who made it?
faq.answer: SharuX is made by Roki with help of MILLION

faq.question: Can i use it?
faq.answer: Yes, you can. Just sign up

faq.question: Can i see the source code?
faq.answer: SharuX is fully open sourced project and the source code is available here.
